title: Yul Brynner reports on his mission to no man's land
creator_credit: Georges Pessis, Stanley Wright, Office of the United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees and BBC
brief_description: Actor Yul Brynner visits various refugee camps in Austria and interviews some of the inmates, who have been there from five to fifteen years and describe their fruitless efforts to have themselves accepted as immigrants to other countries.
